revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSR-1000 |revision=N (Ver: A1) |asin=B004HZG2MO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |availability=End of Support Life |fcc_date=03/25/2010 |fcc_id=KA2SR1000NA1 |ic_id=4216A-SR1000NA1 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.4 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256EHT2I-90G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QF-BCE7 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45 |wi1_module=Cameo WLN-1313 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9106 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5081 |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;UPD720114;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 2-Bit, 2-Port, Low Voltage Translator Bus Switch;Pericom;PI3VT3306;;1;,,, 30V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;unknown;4803;;6;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1;,,, Quad 2-input AND gate;NXP;74LVC08AD;;2;,,, Octal D-type transparent latch;NXP;LVC373A;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input AND Gate;NXP;74HCT08D;;1;, |flags=RTC w/ battery, power switch, heat sink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=9C:D6:43 |oui_eth=9C:D6:43 }} {{TagLine|Wireless N Dual Band Unified Service Router}} :[https://eu.dlink.com/uk/en/products/dsr-1000n-wireless-n-dual-band-unified-service-router Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://eu.dlink.com/uk/en/-/media/business_products/dsr/dsr-1000n/manual/dsr_1000n_manual_2_02_en.pdf Manual] :802.11a/b/g/n 2.4/5GHz (Selectable Dual Band) :3x Detachable 2dBi Omni-Directional Antennas *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/ru/toh/d-link/dsr-1000n ''D-Link DSR-1000N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5010-500BG564-SCP-G ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5010 @500MHz :SoC: Single-core [[MIPS64]] *Storage: 32MB Flash *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9160 802.11abgn *Network: 6x GbE (WAN/LAN) ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 100/240V via C13 ==Images== ---- File:D-Link DSR-1000N Top.jpeg|Board Top File:D-Link DSR-1000N Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:D-Link DSR-1000N USB Top.jpeg|USB Board Top File:D-Link DSR-1000N USB Bottom.jpeg|USB Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
